name: Lee Sin
title: the Blind Monk
shortBio: A master of Ionia's ancient martial arts, Lee Sin is a principled fighter who channels the essence of the dragon spirit to face any challenge. Though he lost his sight many years ago, the warrior-monk has devoted his life to protecting his homeland against any who would dare upset its sacred balance. Enemies who underestimate his meditative demeanor will endure his fabled burning fists and blazing roundhouse kicks.

skins.name: Traditional Lee Sin
skins.description: Every now and then, an upstart martial artist climbs the mountain to the monastery near the peak and challenges the blindfolded master who's made his home there. When that happens, those living at the mountain's base know to ready some clean bandages and hot tea—for it won't be long before the challenger returns, utterly defeated.

skins.name: Acolyte Lee Sin
skins.description: The traditional garb of Shojin acolytes never sat well on the ambitious shoulders of young Lee Sin, who brimmed with more raw potential than any of his fellow acolytes could ever dream of. And yet, he grew into it: both the garb, and the dragon's power.

skins.name: Dragon Fist Lee Sin

chromas.name: Dragon Fist Lee Sin Duel Black
Dragon Fist Lee Sin Duel Blue
Dragon Fist Lee Sin Duel Yellow
Dragon Fist Lee Sin (Ruby)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during 2018.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during 2018.

skins.description: A famed martial artist beloved the world over, Lee Sin prefers to train far away from the public eye, honing his craft in solitude. Rumors claim that he can punch with the fury of a dragon—but if anyone knows for sure, they're not talking.

skins.name: Muay Thai Lee Sin

chromas.name: Muay Thai Lee Sin (Ruby)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2024.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2024.

skins.description: Known as “the art of eight limbs”, Muay Thai is a multidisciplinary fighting style practiced by boxers for centuries. Lee Sin, who has mastered many forms of hand-to-hand combat, is among its greatest champions.

skins.name: Pool Party Lee Sin
skins.description: Lee Sin loves the feeling of the sand between his toes, the sound of the crashing waves, and the warm sun against his skin. He also loves a strong coconut drink. Lee Sin likes to party.

skins.name: SKT T1 Lee Sin
skins.description: Honoring Bengi's winning performance as Lee Sin during the 2013 World Championship.

skins.name: Knockout Lee Sin
skins.description: 'Knockout' Lee Sin is a brutal pit fighter, who made his name in the underground circuit, before leaving the bloody sport for greener, more criminal pastures. He currently sells his services as a “problem-solver” to a select group of monied kingpins.

skins.name: God Fist Lee Sin
skins.description: The arrogant wielder of the God Fist was once a mortal boy, tasked by his predecessor to defeat the master of each martial arts school while blindfolded, before facing him at the peak of a treacherous mountain. Emerging victorious, the boy assumed his title—as well as his immortal sight.

skins.name: Playmaker Lee Sin
skins.description: With a sixth sense for openings in any and all situations, Lee Sin can turn the opposing team's sloppy free kick into a once-in-a-lifetime play talked about for generations to come. Though it's his first year in the majors, some are saying there may never be another player like him.

skins.name: Nightbringer Lee Sin
skins.description: Lee Sin thrives in the heat of combat. An embodiment of passion and fury, he rules over the raw, chaotic emotions of the heart. While his siblings fight for various ideals, Lee Sin fights for the thrill of battle itself, striking with power and unpredictability.

skins.name: Prestige Nightbringer Lee Sin
skins.description: Fully consumed by chaos and his blind devotion to the thrill of battle, Lee Sin has become night incarnate, gilded by his divinity.

skins.name: FPX Lee Sin

chromas.name: FPX Lee Sin (Elite)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

skins.description: Honoring Tian's winning performance as Lee Sin during the 2019 World Championship.

chromas.name: Storm Dragon Lee Sin (Ruby)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2020.

chromas.name: Storm Dragon Lee Sin (Jadeclaw)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 Worlds event.

chromas.name: Storm Dragon Lee Sin (Emberclaw)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the Worlds 2021 event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the Worlds 2021 event.

chromas.name: Storm Dragon Lee Sin Mythic Chroma

skins.description: A warrior ascetic consumed with an electric passion for justice, Lee Sin climbed the mountain of the storm dragon Ao Shin, hoping to receive his blessing. Having returned from the summit as a legendary Dragonmancer, Lee Sin now doles out thunderous punishment to villains everywhere—ever under the watchful eye of his draconic patron.

skins.name: Prestige Nightbringer Lee Sin (2022)
skins.description: Fully consumed by chaos and his blind devotion to the thrill of battle, Lee Sin has become night incarnate, gilded by his divinity.

skins.name: Zenith Games Lee Sin

chromas.name: Zenith Games Lee Sin (Ruby)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

skins.description: Martial artist Lee Sin's focus on overwhelming his opponents before they could react had won him many championships, but also burned him out. Realizing that his strategy had been rooted in fear, he augments his body not to give himself more strength, but to concentrate his mind and senses.

skins.name: Heavenscale Lee Sin

chromas.name: Heavenscale Lee Sin (Ruby)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2024.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2024.

chromas.name: Heavenscale Lee Sin (Lustrous)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2024 Heavenscale event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2024 Heavenscale event.

skins.description: All hail the Prince of Dragons, heir to the throne of the heavenly Kingdom of Dragons! A noble and just prince, Lee Sin is deeply devoted to his people. When he hears the telltale crackle of fireworks just below the clouds, he knows it's time to learn more about his human subjects—and how they greet the New Year with a bang!

skins.name: Divine Heavenscale Lee Sin
skins.description: All hail the Prince of Dragons, heir to the throne of the heavenly Kingdom of Dragons! A noble and just prince, Lee Sin is deeply devoted to his people. When he hears the telltale crackle of fireworks just below the clouds, he knows it's time to learn more about his human subjects—and how they greet the New Year with a bang!

chromas.name: T1 Lee Sin (Elite)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during T1 World Championship showcase.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive during T1 World Championship showcase.

skins.description: Honoring Oner's winning performance as Lee Sin during the 2023 World Championship.

skins.name: Inkshadow Lee Sin

chromas.name: Inkshadow Lee Sin (Ruby)

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2025.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2025.

skins.description: Before seeking haven in Udyr's temple, before reckoning with the volatile power of his magical pact, before striking a deal to become the river spirit's arms and fists, Lee Sin took no sides. All he wanted was to help those who had lost everything—until he became one of them. And having nothing left to lose gave him everything to fight for.

passive.name: Flurry
passive.description: After Lee Sin uses an ability, his next 2 basic attacks gain Attack Speed and return Energy.

spells.name: Sonic Wave / Resonating Strike
spells.description:
Sonic Wave: Lee Sin projects a discordant wave of sound to locate his enemies, dealing physical damage to the first enemy it encounters. If Sonic Wave hits, Lee Sin can cast Resonating Strike for the next 3 seconds.
Resonating Strike: Lee Sin dashes to the enemy hit by Sonic Wave, dealing physical damage based on the target's missing Health.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Lee Sin projects a discordant wave of sound, dealing @InitialDamage@ physical damage to the first enemy hit, granting True Sight of them, and allows Lee Sin to Recast for the next @ReactivateTime@ seconds.

Recast: Lee Sin dashes to the enemy hit by the sound wave, dealing between @RecastDamage@ to @EmpoweredDamage@ physical damage scaling with the target's missing Health. @SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Safeguard / Iron Will
spells.description:
Safeguard: Lee Sin rushes to target ally, shielding himself from damage. If the ally is a champion, they are also shielded. After using Safeguard, Lee Sin can cast Iron Will.
Iron Will: Lee Sin's intense training allows him to thrive in battle. Lee Sin gains Life Steal and Spell Vamp.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Lee Sin dashes to an ally or ward. If the target is a champion, Lee Sin grants them and himself @ShieldAmount@ Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds and reduces this Ability's Cooldown by @W1CooldownRecovered*100@%. Lee Sin may Recast for the next @W1ReactivateTime@ seconds.

Recast: Lee Sin gains @LifestealAndSpellVamp@% Life Steal and Spell Vamp for @LifestealAndSpellVampTime@ seconds.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Tempest / Cripple
spells.description:
Tempest: Lee Sin smashes the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage and reveals enemy units hit. If Tempest hits an enemy, Lee Sin can cast cripple.
Cripple: Lee Sin cripples nearby enemies damaged by Tempest, reducing their Move Speed. Move Speed recovers gradually over the duration.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Lee Sin smashes the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals @InitialDamage@ magic damage and reveals them for @SlowDuration@ seconds. If this hits an enemy, Lee Sin can Recast for the next @ReactivateTime@ seconds.

Recast: Lee Sin Slows nearby enemies struck by the shockwave by @SlowAmount@% decaying over @SlowDuration@ seconds.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Dragon's Rage
spells.description: Lee Sin performs a powerful roundhouse kick launching his target back, dealing physical damage to the target and any enemies they collide with. Enemies the target collides with are knocked into the air for a short duration. This technique was taught to him by Jesse Perring, although Lee Sin does not kick players off the map.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Lee Sin performs a powerful roundhouse kick Knocking Back an enemy champion and dealing @Damage@ physical damage.

Enemies the target collides with are briefly Knocked Up and take @Damage@ plus @PercentHPCarryThrough@% of the kicked enemy's bonus Health as physical damage.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@
